entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early this evening then clearing. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
